SEARCH
Package org.example.model.chaosgame

Class ChaosGameDescription

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.chaosgame.ChaosGameDescription
public class ChaosGameDescription extends Object

ChaosGameDescription.

A class that represents a description of a chaos game. The description includes the minimum and maximum coordinates of the game, as well as a list of transforms that are used to generate the game.

Since:
0.2.0
Version:
1.0.0

    Constructs a new ChaosGameDescription object with the given minimum and maximum coordinates, as well as a list of transforms, and a list of weights.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChaosGameDescription

      public ChaosGameDescription(Vector2D minCoords, Vector2D maxCoords, List<Transform2D> transforms)
      Constructs a new ChaosGameDescription object with the given minimum and maximum coordinates, as well as a list of transforms.
      Parameters:
      minCoords - is the minimum coordinates to use.
      maxCoords - is the maximum coordinates to use.
      transforms - is the list of transforms to use.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given minimum or maximum coordinates are null, if the given list of transforms is null, empty or contains null objects

    • ChaosGameDescription

      public ChaosGameDescription(ChaosGameDescription description)
      Deep copy constructor for the ChaosGameDescription class. Used to create a new ChaosGameDescription with the same values as the given description
      Parameters:
      description - the ChaosGameDescription object to copy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given description is null

    • ChaosGameDescription

      public ChaosGameDescription(Vector2D minCoords, Vector2D maxCoords, List<Transform2D> transforms, List<Integer> weights)
      Constructs a new ChaosGameDescription object with the given minimum and maximum coordinates, as well as a list of transforms, and a list of weights.
      Parameters:
      minCoords - is the minimum coordinates to use.
      maxCoords - is the maximum coordinates to use.
      transforms - is the list of transforms to use.
      weights - is the list of weights to use.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given minimum or maximum coordinates are null, if the given list of transforms is null, empty or contains null objects

      public int getWeight(int index)

      Returns:
      the weight of the transform.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index is out of bounds.

    • setWeights

      public void setWeights(List<Integer> weights)

      Parameters:
      weights - the list of weights.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of weights is null, empty or contains null objects.
